<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eun</catalog>
            <entry>15221</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="it">Stati Membri dell'UE e loro bandiere</string>
            <string language="en">EU Member States and Their Flags</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">EU Mitgliedsstaaten und ihre Markierungsfahnen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Etats membres d'EU et leurs indicateurs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estados de membro do EU e suas bandeiras</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κράτη μέλη της ΕΕ και οι σημαίες τους</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estados miembros del EU y sus indicadores</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="it">Questo è un esercizio di abbinamento ( con limite di tempo e feedback rapido) sugli stati membri dell'UE e sulle loro bandiere corrispondenti.</string>
            <string language="en">This is a matching exercise (with a time limit and rapid feedback) about the EU member states and their corresponding flags.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist eine zusammenpassende Übung (mit einer
Grenzzeit und einem schnellen Feedback) über die EU-Mitgliedsstaaten 
und ihre entsprechenden Markierungsfahnen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est un exercice assorti (avec un délai et un 
feedback rapide) au sujet des Etats membres d'EU et de leurs 
indicateurs correspondants.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este é um exercício combinando (com um limite 
de tempo e um feedback rápido) sobre os estados de membro do EU e 
suas bandeiras correspondentes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι μια ταιριάζοντας με άσκηση (με ένα 
χρονικό όριο και μια γρήγορη ανατροφοδότηση) για τα κράτη μέλη 
της ΕΕ και τις αντίστοιχες σημαίες τους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esto es un ejercicio que corresponde con (con un 
límite de tiempo y un feedback rápido) sobre los Estados miembros 
del EU y sus indicadores correspondientes.</string>
          </description>
        </general>

          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>

            <value>compulsory education</value>
          </context>
          <typicalAgeRange>
            <string language="x-t-lre">11-19</string>
            <string language="en">11-19</string>
          </typicalAgeRange>
          <description>
            <string language="it">Obiettivo:- gli alunni dimostreranno conoscenza degli stati membri dell'UE e delle loro corrispondenti bandiere.Metodo didattico: lettura attiva ( leggere e svolgere un esercizio interattivo) e feedback rapido. Strumento di presentazione dei contenuti: pagina web( testo, grafica e link) con gli stati membri dell'UE e le loro bandiere. Strumento di valutazione: esercizio di abbinamento, con limite di tempo e feedback rapido.</string>
            <string language="en">Objective: 

- pupils will demonstrate knowledge of the EU member states and their corresponding flags

Teaching method: active learning (reading + doing an interactive exercise)  and rapid feedback

Content presentation tool: web page (text, graphics and hyperlinks) with the EU member states and their corresponding flags

Assessment tool: matching exercise with a time limit and rapid feedback</string>
          </description>
        </educational>
